title: Hypertension Treatment Study
summary: This study evaluates the effect of Drug X on hypertension in 500 patients aged 40-65. The trial lasted 12 months, and results showed a 15% reduction in blood pressure. Some adverse effects were reported.

title: Diabetes Drug Study
summary: This study assesses the impact of Drug Y on diabetes patients. 600 participants were monitored over 9 months, showing an average glucose level reduction of 20%. Mild nausea was reported in some cases.

title: Cancer Immunotherapy Trial
summary: This phase 2 clinical trial examines the efficacy of an experimental immunotherapy for lung cancer. 300 patients were treated, and tumor shrinkage was observed in 45% of participants. Severe immune-related adverse events occurred in 10% of cases.

title: Alzheimer’s Disease Drug Study
summary: A new drug aimed at slowing cognitive decline in early-stage Alzheimer’s patients was tested in a double-blind study with 450 participants. Results showed a cognitive function improvement of 12% over placebo.

title: COVID-19 Vaccine Booster Trial
summary: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of a booster dose for an existing COVID-19 vaccine. The trial included 2,000 participants and found a 95% increase in antibody response with mild to moderate side effects.
